article.subject: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body:
By now it's pretty obvious which 10 games will be in the top 10 people's choice but what about their order?

I will gift 100 GG + all tips for this thread (if any) to whoever gets the most ranks correct (split as evenly as possible if there's a tie).

Here are the contenders (in random order):
[o]Scythe, Viticulture, Gloomhaven, Terraforming Mars, Friday, Lord of the Rings LCG, Arkham Horror LCG, Onirim, Robinson Crusoe, Mage Knight[/o]

And here's my guess (out of competition):
[o]
01. Mage Knight
02. Friday
03. Gloomhaven
04. Lord of the Rings LCG
05. Scythe
06. Terraforming Mars
07. Viticulture
08. Robinson Crusoe
09. Arkham Horror LCG
10. Onirim
[/o]

Edit: Everyone can choose the top 10 games freely. You don't need to use the 10 that I have suggested.

article.subject: Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body: I don't see Reiner Knizia's Lord of the Rings on that list. Surely it's still on Kevin's list!

article.body: Tomorrow is going to be so much fun

article.subject: Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body:
kerskine wrote:

Tomorrow is going to be so much fun


I'm wondering if there's something you aren't telling us...

article.subject: Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body:
kerskine wrote:

Tomorrow is going to be so much fun


That sounds very suspicious indeed. I cannot imagine that any of the 10 games I listed didn't make the top 100 but just in case:
Everyone can choose the top 10 freely. You don't need to use the 10 that I have suggested.

I was wondering who would be the first to predict that

I thought about it myself.


Thought about, but last year, the number of votes between #1 and #2 was more than the entire total of votes item #13 (still fairly high on the list) received. A contender would have to have a very high percentage of #1s and Mage Knight would almost have to lose votes entirely for an upset. Not saying it couldn't happen.

article.subject: Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body: As you can see from what's been revealed so far, Gloomhaven wasn't nearly as high as most of you thought. I suspect Dave has the reason for it. Next year should be very interesting. I think it will be in a lot more hands.

Close, but not quite out yet. I suspect next year it will finally drop out of top 10 at least.

article.subject: Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body: What time is the 5-1 reveal Kevin?

article.subject: Re: Rank the People's Choice Top 10 - 2017
article.body: Probably in the next couple of hours. I'm only working half a day today so in the next 3.5 hours at worst.
